member.name: T:Ekstrand.Text.StringTokenizer
member.summary: StringTokenizer equivalent to the JAVA version.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.Text.StringTokenizer.#ctor
member.summary: Initialize an instance of StringTokenizer

member.name: M:Ekstrand.Text.StringTokenizer.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initialize an instance of StringTokenizer with a given string using default delimiters.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.Text.StringTokenizer.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initialize an instance of StringTokenizer with a given string using defined delimiters.
member.param: String defined delimiters use to tokenized the given string
member.remarks: String delimiters would be evaluate each character as separate delimiters to tokenize a given string.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.Text.StringTokenizer.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initialize an instance of StringTokenizer with a given string, defined string delimiters, and return delimiters
member.param: String defined delimiters use to tokenized the given string
Boolean When true would return each delimiter as tokens otherwise the delimiters would not be returned.
member.remarks: String delimiters would be evaluate each character as separate delimiters to tokenize a given string.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Text.StringTokenizer.StringSource
member.summary: The string to be tokenized

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Text.StringTokenizer.Delimiters
member.summary: The delimiters to be used to tokenized a string.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Text.StringTokenizer.IsReturnDelimiters
member.summary: If true, then the delimiter characters are also returned as tokens.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Text.StringTokenizer.HasMoreTokens
member.summary: Tests if there are more tokens available to be returned.
member.returns: Returns true if and only if there is at least one token in the string after the current position otherwise false.

member.name: P:Ekstrand.Text.StringTokenizer.Count
member.summary: The number of tokens that would be generated.
member.returns: Return the number of calculated tokens that would be generated.

member.summary: Gets the current element in the collection (Inherited from IEnumerator.)

member.name: M:Ekstrand.Text.StringTokenizer.NextToken
member.summary: The next token from the given string.

member.summary: The next token from the given string using the given defined delimiter.
member.param: String delimiter to be use to generate this next token and on wards.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.Text.StringTokenizer.TokensToArray
member.summary: Return an array of tokens based on current set of delimiters.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.Text.StringTokenizer.TokensToList
member.summary: Return a list of tokens based on current set of delimiters.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.Text.StringTokenizer.ResetTokenizer
member.summary: Reset the StringTokenizer to its starting position and set the delimiters to its default values.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.Text.StringTokenizer.Reset
